summary.textblock: This document contains corrections to the comment and inspection periods allowed in the Department of Veterans Affair's proposed rule on Exclusions from Income, published Friday, December 17, 1993 (58 FR 65958).

date.textblock: Comments must be received on or before February 15, 1994. Comments will be available for public inspection until February 25, 1994.

further.textblock: Steven Thornberry, Consultant, Regulations Staff, Compensation and Pension Service, Veterans Benefits Administration, 810 Vermont Avenue, NW., Washington, DC 20420, Telephone (202) 233-3005.

supplem.textblock: Executive Order 12866 orders that the public be afforded a meaningful opportunity to comment on a proposed rule, which includes being granted a comment period of not less than 60 days.
As published, the proposed rule allows only a 30 day comment period.
Accordingly, the publication on December 17, 1993 of the proposed rule, which is the subject of FR Doc. 93-30811, is corrected as follows:
caption of the preamble, remove the date ``January 18, 1994'' and in its place add ``February 15, 1994''; remove the date ``January 26, 1994'' and in its place add ``February 25, 1994''.
